content.title: Assign Images to Rows through Master Data
content.body:
1. Click Delete All
  2. Click Add two times.
    You can see that three rows have been added in this window.
  3. Under the employeeImage column, click the image selection button.
    The list of all the images added in the application appears.
  4. Select any image.
  5. Click OK.
  6. Repeat the above three steps to add images to the remaining two rows.
